"Welcome to Devil's Advocates, a pass-and-play drinking game. After starting a game, the " "application will prompt you to enter all player names. After this is complete, the game " "will start.

"
"The game consists of rounds. Each round, two players will be selected to argue in favor of " "something (usually something terrible). A judge is also selected. The players must then " "rant in favor of their topic for the specified time without stopping or repeating " "themselves. After both players have finished, the judge must decide who wins the round " "based on the strength of the argument and how well the person flowed (i.e. how well he/she " "spoke without pausing or repeating).

"
"Then, the winner of the round will cycle out and the loser will stay for the next round. " "The judge must sentence the loser by drinking. The loser has to drink an equal amount." "When a player refuses to argue in favor of something, drink, or otherwise chooses to quit, " "they are eliminated from the game. The game ends when there are only two people remaining. " "These two people are the winners. I didn't think of a way to break the tie so you have to " "figure that out yourself. Play Rock-Paper-Scissors or arm wrestle or knife fight. I don't " "fucking care.

"
"This game is recommended for 5+ players. As in, more than five players. But yes, also for " "people over the age of five. The instructions above assume the default settings. For " "explanation of your current custom settings (if there are any), see below.
"
